name: Fast Master Turbo
description:
Pilot your racer at ludicrous speeds while avoiding treacherous obstacles. Can you become the master of FAST?

Credits:
Game Designer - Sarah Ferguson
Visual Designer - Cora Stephens
Audio Lead - Eric Berzins
Announcer / Dialogue Editor - Marc Pinsky
Composer - Jose Jimenez Filomeno
Sound Designer - Nicholas Colella
